00008 #include "Config.h"
00009 #include "../debug/debug.h"
00010 #include "Main.h"
00011 #include <iostream>
00012 #include <fstream>
00013 #include <map>
00014 
00015 //Jesli w konfiguracji nie podano portu to uzywamy tego
00016 #define DEFAULT_SIP_PROXY_PORT 5060;
00017 
00018 //Rozmiar danych w pakiecie RTP w bajtach
00019 #define DEFAULT_RTP_PAYLOAD_SIZE 160
00020 
00021 //gdy nie wysyłamy steganografii, pakiety sa wysylane w odstepach 20ms
00022 #define DEFAULT_NOSTEG_RTP_DELAY 20
00023 
00024 #define DEFAULT_QUEUE_READ_INTERVAL 10
00025 
00026 Config::Config(string configFile) {
00027         PRN_(4, "in config constr");
00028         VAR_(4, configFile);
00029 
00030         map<string, string> settings;
00031         ifstream cf;
00032 
00033         cf.open(configFile.c_str());
00034 
00035         if (!cf.is_open())
00036                 Main::getInstance()->handleError("Unable to open configuration file: "
00037                                 + configFile);
00038 
00039         while (!cf.eof()) {
00040                 string ln;
00041                 getline(cf, ln);
00042                 if (ln[0] == '#' || ln == "")
00043                         continue;
00044                 int eqpos = ln.find_first_of('=');
00045                 string argname = ln.substr(0, eqpos);
00046                 string argval = ln.substr(eqpos + 1);
00047                 settings[argname] = argval;
00048                 VAR_(4, argname+" = "+argval);
00049         }
00050 
00051         if (settings["calling"] == "1")
00052                 weAreCalling = true;
00053         else if (settings["calling"] == "0")
00054                 weAreCalling = false;
00055         else
00056                 Main::getInstance()->handleError(
00057                                 "wrong configuration file format near \"calling\"");
00058 
00059         //wartosci domyslne parametrow tutaj:
00060         SIPProxyPort = DEFAULT_SIP_PROXY_PORT;
00061         RTPPayloadSize = DEFAULT_RTP_PAYLOAD_SIZE;
00062         noStegRTPDelay = DEFAULT_NOSTEG_RTP_DELAY;
00063         incQueueReadInterval = DEFAULT_QUEUE_READ_INTERVAL;
00064         incQueueSize = 10;
00065 
00066         //ustawienia ktore wczytujemy zawsze:
00067         doSteg = (settings["do-steg"] == "1");
00068 
00069         //ustawienia ktore wczytujemy zawsze:
00070         if (doSteg) {
00071                 maxStegInterval = atoi(settings["max-steg-interval"].c_str());
00072                 minStegInterval = atoi(settings["min-steg-interval"].c_str());
00073                 stegSequence = settings["steg-sequence"];
00074                 stegDataFile = settings["steg-data-file"];
00075         }
00076 
00077         outputAudioFilePath = settings["output-audio-data-file"];
00078         myUser = settings["username"];
00079         myPass = settings["pass"];
00080         localIP = settings["local-ip"];
00081         SIPProxyIP = settings["proxy-ip"];
00082         SIPProxyPort = atoi(settings["proxy-port"].c_str());
00083         audioFilePath = settings["audio-data-file"];
00084 
00085         if (weAreCalling) {
00086                 calleeID = settings["callee-username"];
00087         }
00088 
00089         PRN_(4, "end config constr");
00090 }
